#text=Yesterday , as I pulled my bicycle out of the garage , I realized it had a flat tire .
#text=First , I went to the tool box and got out the wrench and other necessary tools .
#text=Then , I realized I did n't have a new bike tire .
#text=So , I opened the door to my car and got in .
#text=I drove to the nearest bicycle shop and bought two new bicycle tires -- one for now and one for later .
#text=I drove back home where the bicycle was waiting for me .
#text=I took the old , flat tire off of the bicycle using my wrench to loosen the screws and other mechanical devices .
#text=I then stretched the new tire out over the wheel and affixed it .
#text=I twirled it around and tested it to make sure that it was properly fastened .
#text=Next , I drove around the driveway to make sure that it would hold .
#text=Sure enough , it was secure and ready for me to go on my bike ride .
